title: What am I doing wrong

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Here's a recent game I had with Xayah, can someone explain to me why I got an S-? My friend, the Rakan, had 2/0/18 and got an S+, whereas I got 18/0/3 and an S-. I had 153 cs within a 25 minute game, which is roughly 6 cs/m. I broke 3 inhibs and 2 turrets... Please tell me what I'm doing wrong or what I have to do to get an S on Xayah, because I'm trying to get to mastery 7. Thank you!

replies.body: Thank you for the reply, I'll make it a priority.

It might have been the CS score that kept you below that S-. Keep in mind that each champion type has slightly different [**requirements for higher grades**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide), and you're also being compared to how well other players do with that champion. Essentially you need to do better than a certain percentage of Xayah players in order to get S+'s.
Ohh okay I see. Thank you for the explanation, it really helped.

It was definitely the cs, a score like that with 10 cs per minute will almost always result in an s+ rating. I recommend going into custom games and practicing just pure cs mechanics so you can boost those numbers up a bit!
Thank you for the advice, I'll definitely keep that in mind for next time!
